BUG DESCRIPTION
===============

BUG: Addition instead of subtraction

BUGGY LINE:
    security_score = key_strength + validity_period / 365 * 50

FIXED LINE:
    security_score = key_strength - validity_period / 365 * 50

EXPLANATION:
Longer validity should reduce security
Result is used in return value

IMPACT: api key management produces incorrect results
PRIORITY: P2
